de.eckhartarnold.client

Interface ResizeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Caption, CaptionOverlay, ControlPanel, ControlPanelOverlay, Filmstrip, FilmstripOverlay, Gallery, GalleryBase, GalleryWidget, ImagePanel, PanelOverlayBase

    public interface ResizeListener
    Interface to be implemented by widgets that will be informed if their parent widget has been resized.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onResized()
      Called after a parent widget has been resized.
      void prepareResized()
      Called after a parent widget has been resized, but before the new size is processed via onResized.

    • Method Detail

      • onResized

        void onResized()
        Called after a parent widget has been resized.

      • prepareResized

        void prepareResized()
        Called after a parent widget has been resized, but before the new size is processed via onResized. The method prepareResized is needed to allow composite widgets that contain absolute panels to temporarily detach these absolute panels in order to allow the browser to calculate widget sizes correctly. The implementation of onResized can then re-attach the detached absolute panels. Methods prepareResized and onResized should therefore always be used in conjunction.
